department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Request for Proposal to provide Logistics Services to Maritime Forces Pacific (MARPAC)
description: The contract shall endeavour to address the logistical needs of MARPAC, supporting various classes of naval vessels and other entities as necessary
duration_in_months: display duration for expected end date and first date as data if avaliable
full_summary:
###Government Tender Announcement: West Coast Port Services

####Notice Details
* **Tender Reference**: WS4125871059-Doc4157675137
* **Publication Date**: September 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 12, 2023 at 14:00:00 (PST)
* **Contract Status**: Expired

####Notice Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide logistics support services for the Department of National Defence (DND) at various ports and locations throughout the Canadian Coast. The services will be provided on an “if and when requested” basis and will include support for miscellaneous classes of naval vessels and support staff assigned to Maritime Forces Pacific (MARPAC) when deployed in the geographical areas specified below.

####Contract Details
* **Contract Duration**: Expected contract start date is unknown; expected contract end date is August 31, 2025
* **Contract Location**: Various ports and locations throughout British Columbia
* **Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
* **Procurement Method**: Open Tendering
* **UNSPSC Code**: 81141601 (Logistics)
* **Trade Agreements**: None

####Key Contract Requirements
* Provide logistics support services for the period of the contract and any optional period
* Identify and assign a Project Coordinator to manage the logistics support services
* Respond to requests for goods and services in various ports or locations throughout the specified geographical area

####Contractor Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contracting Entity Contact**: Mitch Anthony (SPAC/PSPC) at (613) [phone number] or mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca 

####Additional Information
* The contract is not subjected to any trade agreements
* The contract location is specified in the terms of reference
* The contract will be awarded based on an evaluation of the contractor's proposal (Request for Proposal)

#### Tendering Documents
* The solicitation documents for this tender are available at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17442105?extsite=MTc0NDIxMDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MD
